title: Aplicação de Large Language Models na Análise e Síntese de Documentos Jurídicos: Uma Revisão de Literatura
abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) have been increasingly used to optimize the analysis and synthesis of legal documents, enabling the automation of tasks such as summarization, classification, and retrieval of legal information. This study aims to conduct a systematic literature review to identify the state of the art in prompt engineering applied to LLMs in the legal context.
